ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Get out from here, you are accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Go hence, execrable," (said the Lord), "from this place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: The Lord said: "Then get out of here; you are rejected,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God told him, "Get out of the garden; you are rejected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Said Allah, “Therefore exit from Paradise, for you are an outcast.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Allah) said: "Then leave, for verily, you are an outcast. "
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Then get out of it, for surely you are driven away:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said He, 'Then go thou forth hence; thou art accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Then go thou forth from hence, for lo! thou art outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Then get out of here; for you are accursed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: then get thee forth therefrom; verily thou art one damned.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Begone hence, for you are indeed an outcast,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (Allah) said: "Then get thee out from here; for thou art rejected, accursed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Allah) said: "Then, get out from here, for verily, you are Rajim (an outcast or a cursed one)." [Tafsir At-Tabari]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Then get out of here, for you are an outcast”.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:34] Said He, ‘Then be gone from hence, that is, from the Garden — but it is also said, from the heavens — for you are indeed accursed, outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said to him: (Then go thou forth from hence) from the form of angels; it is also said that this means: go forth from My favour and mercy; and it is also said that this means: go forth from the earth, (for verily you are outcast) accursed and banished from My mercy.
